author: Zack Budryk
title: Former FDA head: 'The Sun Belt is going to be in for a tough week'
description: Former Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said Sunday that while mitigation efforts against the coronavirus are proving effective, some southwestern states would likely be hard-hit by the virus in th...
content:
Former Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said Sunday that while mitigation efforts against the coronavirus are proving effective, some southwestern states would likely be hard-hit by the virus in the week ahead.
